title: Time Traveler's Rock: Permit Required
description: This is a short story teaser for the book series Time Traveler's Rock.The series main character, James, is an accidental time traveler, who has been traveling through time for a few years, but now has been transported to the year 2525 where he is put on trial for time travel without a permit. During the trial you get a glimpse into places James has visited and people he has met. How will the trial end? Download the book to find out and get hooked on the series.If you liked this teaser be sure to visit the first book in this series Time Traveler’s Flaming Eagle at the link below. The next book in the series Time Traveler’s White Buffalo will be available soon.
author: Rick Heiman
